data.persona: Little pigs? Nonsense. I am after the largest man possible. A grizzly, even. I am out for blood. To calm a vengeance that is starved.
data.description:
You are in the Old Queen Farm.
Once a fairly profitable farm, the Old Queen Farm is now a deteriorated old shack surrounded by uninhabitable fields with soil incapable of growing even weeds. The farm house shows signs that is being occupied by wild animals, and the roof is beginning to cave inwards.
There's a crucifix and a name placard here.
A rat and a bird are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a wolf's tooth and a costume.

data.short_motivation: I will steal the rat to use as bait.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the bait as distraction to escape from the wild animals.
data.long_motivation: I will escape the farm and head towards the cave.
